sense.gloss: to become loose, to slacken (e.g. rope)
to become less tense, to relax, to let one's guard down
to slacken (e.g. coldness, supervision), to become lax
to become softer (e.g. ground, facial expression), (of ice) to partially melt
(of a market price) to go down slightly

sdata.j: ↑普通↑↓ふつう↓ネジはね、のの↑字↑↓じ↓に↑回↑↓まわ↓すと↑締↑↓し↓まって、のの↑字↑↓じ↓の↑反対↑↓はんたい↓に↑回↑↓まわ↓すと↑緩↑↓|ゆる↓む|んだよ。
sdata.e: Normal screws when turned clockwise will tighten and when turned anti-clockwise will loosen.
